title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to attend IMF, World Bank meets in US - Hindustan Times
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to attend IMF, World Bank meets in US  Hindustan Times
description: Nirmala Sitharaman is the third high-level minister to visit the US in the last week, with External Affairs Minister (EAM) S Jaishankar and Defence Minister Rajnath Singh attending the India-US 2 2 ministerial with their US counterparts on April 11.
